Load libraries:

```{r}
#| message: false
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

Loading the data:

```{r}
if (!exists("data")) {
  data <- read_tsv("../data/01_dat_load.tsv")
}
```

Creating age groups:

```{r}
#Adding agegroups:
data <- data %>%
  mutate(Age_group = cut(Age, breaks = seq(10, 100, by = 10)))

#relocating the agegroups to be place behinde age:
data <- data %>%
  relocate(Age_group, .after = Age)

```
